resources.string: This GTIN-13 code is not correct
GTIN-13 code is the code printed just below the barcode. \n\n If the code only contains 12 digits, add a zero in front of the code to get the GTIN-13 code.
Sorry, this GTIN code is not in the database.
Find on the product the digits printed below the barcode. 13 digits are required, if you have 12 digits, just add a 0 in the first position.\n
This app is powered with the data of the Product Open Data project of Open Knowledge Foundation..
